AppenderInfo.AppenderDesc: This Appender will write log information into physical files.

Argument.Name: file
Argument.Description: The full path of plain-text file which you want to store log information.

Argument.Name: appendToFile
Argument.Description: Append or overwrite if the log file was existed.

Argument.Name: rollingStyle
Argument.Description: Assign the condition which make file rolling.

Argument.Name: lockingModel
Argument.Description: Indicate the lock mode of this log file.

Argument.Name: maxSizeRollBackups
Argument.Description: Indicate to keep how many log files.

Argument.Name: staticLogFileName
Argument.Description: True if always should be logged to the same file, otherwise false.

Argument.Name: maximumFileSize
Argument.Description: The maximum size that the output file is allowed to reach before being rolled over to backup files.
